name: Ngrok Indicator
description:
Panel indicator for ngrok status and active tunnels.

Features:
* Color-coded status icon (green/red/neutral)
* Active tunnels list with protocol badges
* One-click URL copying to clipboard
* Stop tunnels from the menu
* Start saved tunnels from ngrok.yml
* Quick access to traffic inspector
* Config file switching and editing

Permissions:
* Clipboard: URLs are copied when you click a tunnel
